short_summary: Standing Offer for Cybersecurity Program Support
description: National Arts Centre (NAC) is seeking to contract with the vendors who are providing security services for their cybersecurity program. There is a firm-objective contract for the period of one and a half years, starting on April 1st, 2023 and ending on September 30th, 2024. The selected vendors (RSA providers) will be provided with goods and services, which will be procured with a limit of $87,000 to $878,000.
duration_in_months: The contract is for a period of 18 months
